Hi,
    I work in academia so would be grateful for the industry perspectiv=
e. I am working on a thesis which includes both WS-* and REST. If UDDI is i=
n fact dead http://www.innoq.com/blog/st/2010/03/uddi_rip.html how are ente=
rprises communicating the WSDL files? Are we talking email, publishing on a=
 Web site, inserting into a db??

Thanks,
Sean.

PS Would the same apply fo=
r WADL files?
